casebody.data:
HOLCOMBE, et al.
v.
OAK ISLAND AIRCRAFT HOUSING, LLC, ET AL. 170P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Christopher A. Chleborowicz, Elijah A.T. Huston, Attorneys at Law, for 717, NC, LLC, et al. G. Grady Richardson, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Holcombe, Claudia, et al. Randolph M. James, Attorney at Law, for Stephenson, Kevin W. Charles D. Meier, Kimberly L. Moore, Attorneys at Law, for Martin, Robert, et al. Dawn Walton, for State. Benedict J. Del Re, Jr., Attorney at Law, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of June 2018 by Plaintiffs (Claudia Holcombe, Tom Pelton, and Dos Aves, LLC) for Sanctions:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
